The videos were tweeted by credible sour: including the White House director of social media and the founder of a conservative student organization.
In the videos: Joe Biden can be heard saying, "we cannot win this re-election, excuse me, we can only re-elect Donald Trump," implying that he believes Trump will be re-elected.
President Trump retweeted one of the vid: commenting, "I agree with Joe!" which further supports the claim.
Twitter labeled one of the tweets as: manipulated media," indicating that the video may have been edited or altered in some way.
